question: Sanjib Datta, who passed away recently, was the veteran personality of which field?
explanation: Sanjib Datta (54), the renowned Bollywood editor, has passed away in Kolkata on 15th September 2019. Â He worked on films like \"Dor\", \"Mardani\", \"Iqbal\", \"Ek Hasini Thi\". Datta has been credited for editing more than 80 films, including Hindi and Bengali. He worked with filmmakers like Kundan Shah, Sriram Raghavan, Pradeep Sarkar among others.
